data.name: Sport Casting Bass Pack
data.detailed_description:
Sport Casting Bass Pack is just what you need to come out a winner in any tournament or competition that involves catching some mighty Bass! This powerful selection of sportfishing tackle includes the super Sports Edition of the FarCaster 8' 6" casting rod and Helios 2000S cast reel that are twice as strong and durable as their predecessors! Not to mention that you also get some of the sturdiest line, a set of hooks, baits and other goodies fit for a real sportfishing champion!
We put a lot of thought into assembling this Sport Casting Bass Pack, so that you wouldn't have to! ;)
Sport Casting Bass Pack is all about becoming a real Bass fishing champion! It includes:

20 BAITCOINS use to purchase advanced fishing tackle, available only for BAITCOINS.
Spend your BAITCOINS wisely!

SPORTY RODS ‘N REELS
Rod:
Sports Edition FarCaster 8' 6"

Reel:
Sports Edition Helios 2000S

TERMINAL TACKLE - a selection of float tackle that you’ll need if you want to enjoy your bass fishing competition to the fullest!

Bass Jigs: Bass Jig 1 Oz., #4/0 (X5); Bass Jig 1 1/2 Oz., #4/0 (X2)

Lines: Braid .008", Flur .014"

EQUIPMENT
FishCabin M

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese-Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64, Mac OS X
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Equivalent CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • Processor: 2 GHz 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
